mapper.select: SELECT A.ROLE_CODE,A.ROLE_NAME FROM TT_ROLE A WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT B.ROLE_CODE FROM TT_JOB_ROLE B WHERE B.JOB_CODE=#{jobCode} AND B.ROLE_CODE=A.ROLE_CODE )ORDER BY A.ROLE_CODE ASC
SELECT A.JOB_CODE,B.ROLE_CODE,B.ROLE_NAME,A.CREATE_BY,A.CREATE_DATE FROM TT_JOB_ROLE A,TT_ROLE B WHERE A.ROLE_CODE=B.ROLE_CODE AND A.JOB_CODE=#{jobCode} ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME FROM TT_ORGANIZATION WHERE PARENT_ORG_CODE IS NULL ORDER BY ORG_SORT ASC
SELECT ORG_CODE,ORG_NAME FROM TT_ORGANIZATION WHERE PARENT_ORG_CODE=#{parentOrgCode} ORDER BY ORG_SORT ASC
